text: Erhard Busek (25 March 1941 â€“ 13 March 2022) was an Austrian politician. He was an important member of the People's Party.James M. Markham (12 June 1986), Waldheim Pledges Fight Against Bias The New York Times. Busek was chief of the party and Vice-Chancellor of Austria in the coalition of the Social Democratic Party of Austria with the People's Party between 1991 to 1995. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Vienna
title: Erhard Busek
